text: Alexandru Piftor (born 9 May 1999) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for SCM Gloria Buzău. ==References== ==External links== * * * Alexandru Piftor at lpf.ro Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Botoșani Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:AFC Chindia Târgoviște players Category:Liga II players Category:SCM Gloria Buzău players
title: Alexandru Piftor
